gui.simpleraces.elf_select.tooltip_dwarv:
- Has 3 forest spirits
- Each spirit gives a 15% chance to dodge any damage except fire and void
- After receiving damage, the spirit goes on recharge for 30 seconds
- Recharge of the spirit in the forest is 2 times faster
- §aFleet-footed in forests§r, dancing among leaves
- §aEyes aglow with nocturnal sight§r amid the trees
- §cShunners of flesh§r, attuned to nature's pure essence
gui.simpleraces.elf_select.tooltip_passi:
§aSole masters of the bow's arcane art§r
- Arrows strike with §e35%§r greater fury
- §bStruck foes shimmer§r, revealed in ethereal light
gui.simpleraces.fairy_select.tooltip_dwa:
- Frail with but §c4 hearts§r of life
- §aSoar until wings weary§r after §e10 seconds§r
- Flight depletes fully ere §crecovery begins§r
- Exhaustion brings §agentle descent§r
- §cHeights terrify§r in weary state
- Unweary, §afalls bring no harm§r
gui.simpleraces.fairy_select.tooltip_pas:
- §aAnimals adore thee§r unconditionally!
- §aCrops flourish faster§r in thy gentle aura
gui.simpleraces.dragon_select.tooltip_pa:
- §aLeap heavensward§r by an extra block
- §aFalls softened§r, as if cradled by winds
- §cWaters wound§r like ancient curses
- §cLeather or gold armor melts§r in draconic fury
gui.simpleraces.arachna_select.tooltip_d:
- §aCling endlessly§r to any wall
- §cHeavy armor burdens doubly§r
- §cWaters halve§r thy speed
- §cFlames scorch 50%§r deeper
gui.simpleraces.arachna_select.tooltip_p:
- Attacks hasten by §e25%§r
- Every third §cbite:
* Rends§r through armor
* Inflicts §2potent poison§r for §e2 seconds§r
gui.simpleraces.dwarf_select.tooltip_dwa:
- §aUnlimited anvil uses§r, forging legends anew
- §aEnchant with interchangeable enchants§r, like sharpness with smite
gui.simpleraces.dwarf_select.tooltip_pas:
- Ale-fueled resilience grants §e20%§r less damage from all perils
- Yet, in their merry haze, §cbows elude their grasp forever§r
- Beneath the stone, they gain §aswiftness and haste§r
- In depths below §bY<0§r, haste ascends to §eII§r, and §anight vision§r pierces the gloom
gui.simpleraces.halfdead_select.tooltip_:
- Vast §a14 hearts§r endure
- Healing diminished by §c80%§r
- Slay to reclaim §e10%§r of foe's max life
- §cMiasma wounds§r hostiles with §e3§r magic damage every §e5 seconds§r in §b5-block§r radius

- §e30%§r more fury against undead
- Kill marks nearest in §b10 blocks§r with §4Death Mark§r for §e30 seconds§r:
- Marked suffer §c33%§r extra harm
- Marked deal §c33%§r less
gui.simpleraces.merfolk_select.tooltip_d:
- §aEndless breath§r in ocean's embrace
- Glide through waves §e2.5§r times swifter
- §aVision clear as crystal§r in watery realms
- Strikes empowered by §e20%§r beneath the tides
gui.simpleraces.merfolk_select.tooltip_p:
- Vitality wanes to mere §c5 hearts§r on arid shores
- Movement slowed by §c33%§r upon the earth
- Attacks falter by §c33%§r in the sun's harsh glare
gui.simpleraces.orc_select.tooltip_dwarv:
- Stupid fury halves damage to mere §c50%§r
- Each punch bestows §6Fervor§r for §e10 seconds§r
- §6Fervor§r hastens attacks by §e10%§r per stack
- Stacks climb to §e10§r, renewing the frenzy
- §6Fervor's§r end brings §cstupor slumber§r for §e3 seconds§r
- In stupor, wounds deepen by §c30%§r
- Below §c4 hearts§r, wits sharpen to §e75%§r damage
gui.simpleraces.orc_select.tooltip_passi:
- §cHunger gnaws thrice§r as fiercely
- Full belly unleashes §awar cry§r:
* §cStuns foes§r for §e3 seconds§r
* §aPurges thy curses§r
* Next strike §etriples harm§r, echoing in area
- Dragon's rotten claw scars: magic strikes §c30%§r harder
- §cWield magic poorly§r, halved in potency
gui.simpleraces.serpentin_select.tooltip:
- §aBeneficial brews linger twice§r as long
- Potions of §estrength, speed, leap§r gain extra level
- §aSplash potions§r (non-ultimate) double duration on all beings

- §c35%§r less harm to un-afflicted foes
- §e25%§r more to those cursed (from base)
- §aImmune§r to poison and wither
- §aDebuffs fade twice§r as swiftly
- Attacks §cprolong enemy curses§r twofold
gui.simpleraces.werewolf_select.tooltip_:
Nocturnal §cbeast form§r:
- §e20%§r fiercer strikes
- §e20%§r swifter strides
- §aEternal haste§r
- §e10%§r chance to §cbleed foes§r for §e10 seconds§r

Diurnal §chuman frailty§r:

- §c30%§r slower pace
